*

Commencement

Aug 10, 2010

The graduates sat, enraptured by the enormous television before them. Images of cold fronts and storm cells moved across the screen as the weather man explained: “And for tonight we’re under a severe storm watch, so we’ll keep an eye on that. For tomorrow, conditions are perfect for a Shark/Bishop attack, but we’ll give you updates as we know them…” One graduate nudged his friend next to him. “Is that like a bishop riding a shark?” he whispered. The other imagined this in his head before nodding affirmatively.
